description:
This library brings Jon Yablonski's Laws of UX to the Figma Community.


Source: lawsofux.com


Version 1.0

  • 2 components
  • 21 variants per component
  • Each component contains a link to the relevant source on lawsofux.com
  • Bonus: Bock's Constant, an unofficial UX Law
